content.html:
Will,
Thanks for the plugin. This is a really important bit of infrastructure for wordpress to be receiving.

Unfortunately, I've noticed that I am receiving the following error:
PHP Fatal error:  Too many values for format string:  => 1218639686 in [my home dir]/public_html/wp-content/plugins/openid/store.php on line 441

That comes from the interpolate function. The error arose when I clicked on the "Manage" tab on the dashboard, and it resulted in a 404.

I'm using WP2.6. Please mail me if you want more information. Thanks!
